verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I know that You are here
I feel your presence near
You move among your people
Bring healing to their lives (x2)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
With my faith
I'll reach for You
With my faith
I'll touch You Lord
My miracle I will receive
And I know that I will never be the same (x2)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Yo Se que estas aqui
Siento tu caminar
Te mueves en el pueblo
Trayendo sanidad (x2)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Con mi fe
Te alcanzare
Con mi fe
Te tocare
Mi milagro
Recibire
Y se que transformado yo sere
